name: v-timer
0:
”Alexa, turn on "v-timer device name"”
”Alexa, turn off "v-timer device name"”
”Alexa, turn on "v-timer device name" for 15 minutes”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With V-timer skill and Alexa you can interact with you V-timer Wifi V3 device. To get started select Enable Skill button in the Alexa App to link you V-timer account to discover all your devices.
The Alexa skill “V-timer” is being used to control via your voice your V-timer Wifi V3 device. The skill has the same features as the “V-timer” mobile app and you can turn on and off V-timer wifi device or tell Alexa to turn on the device for a specific time e.g Turn on V-timer for 22minutes.
You can use the following commands:

Alexa, turn on "v-timer device name"
Alexa, turn off "v-timer device name"
Alexa, turn on "v-timer device name" for 15 minutes

The device is mostly used in Greece and Cyprus and it’s main use is to turn on and off the boiler of apartments.
